RestrictionsEnabled.title: Enables the extension to restrict content
RestrictionsEnabled.description: If set to true then content will be restricted

BlockedPages.title: Defined URLs to restrict
BlockedPages.description: An Array of websites to restrict

RedirectEnabled.title: If the redirect module is enabled
RedirectEnabled.description: If set to true, then blocked pages will be redirected

RedirectTo.title: The URL to redirect to
RedirectTo.description: The page you want blocked traffic redirected to. If not needed, set to "null"
